actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To modify and improve the funding structure of the Environmental Quality Incentives Program.
short_title: Full Enrollment Environmental Quality Incentives Program (FEEQIP) Act of 2004

summary.text: Full Enrollment Environmental Quality Incentives Program (FEEQIP) Act of 2004 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to delete current provisions specifying per-year funding amounts for the environmental quality incentives program from the Commodity Credit Corporation.

titles.title: Full Enrollment Environmental Quality Incentives Program (FEEQIP) Act of 2004
To modify and improve the funding structure of the Environmental Quality Incentives Program.
